forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 10am. Mostly cloudy. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 42 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 16. West wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn nudges the horizon in Boston, a muted, gray sky blankets the city. The atmospheric promise of rain lingers as clouds drift lazily overhead, casting a soft glow over the suburban sprawl. Today, temperatures are poised to oscillate around the mid-fifties before retreating to an evening chill, nudging the mercury to a brisk sixteen. With a steady southwest wind dancing at sixteen miles per hour, gusts leap higher, adding a touch of urgency to the otherwise languid day. As the shadows lengthen toward afternoon, the prospect of rain showers becomes more tangible; a chance of thirty percent awaits those venturing outdoors after ten.

In this tapestry of shifting weather, one may find solace in a cozy sweater layered beneath a light windbreaker—comfort is key against the chill. The increasing likelihood of rain necessitates an umbrella, a faithful companion for those strolls along cobblestone streets or ventures to nearby cafes. As twilight approaches, the skies clear to unveil a stark, crisp night. The evening beckons with the charm of a warm drink, the laughter of friends sharing tales beneath the illuminating glow of street lamps. While the weather may deter some from grand outdoor escapades, it certainly invites others to relish intimate gatherings, perhaps indulging in the quiet discovery of a favorite book or the artful narrative of an enduring film.
